languages.text: "В либрариуме Дома Орселлио тоже хранились заметки об "Обете Императора". Точнее, о самом известном его владельце — Себастьяне Винтерскейле, подающем надежды новоиспеченном Вольном Торговце. Доподлинно неизвестно, как именно сей корабль достался Себастьяну, однако именно на нем Лорд-капитан Винтерскейл прошел сквозь Зев, обретя новый дом в Просторе Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "В либрариуме Дома Орселлио тоже хранились заметки об "Обете Императора". Точнее, о самом известном его владельце — Себастьяне Винтерскейле, подающем надежды новоиспеченном Вольном Торговце. Доподлинно неизвестно, как именно сей корабль достался Себастьяну, однако именно на нем Лорд-капитан Винтерскейл прошел сквозь Зев, обретя новый дом в Просторе Коронус".

languages.text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "В либрариуме Дома Орселлио тоже хранились заметки об "Обете Императора". Точнее, о самом известном его владельце — Себастьяне Винтерскейле, подающем надежды новоиспеченном Вольном Торговце. Доподлинно неизвестно, как именно сей корабль достался Себастьяну, однако именно на нем Лорд-капитан Винтерскейл прошел сквозь Зев, обретя новый дом в Просторе Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "The House Orsellio librarium also held records on the Oath of the Emperor. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian had acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

"The House Orsellio librarium also held records on the Oath of the Emperor. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian had acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

"The House Orsellio librarium also held records on the Oath of the Emperor. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

"The House Orsellio librarium also held records on the Oath of the Emperor. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

"The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: « Le librarium de la maison Orsellio contient également des informations au sujet du Serment de l'Empereur. Le nom de son illustre propriétaire, notamment : Sebastian Winterscale, un jeune libre-marchand particulièrement prometteur. On ignore comment il se l'est procuré, mais c'est à son bord que le seigneur-capitaine Winterscale a traversé la Gueule et trouvé un nouveau foyer dans les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Le librarium de la maison Orsellio contient également des informations au sujet du Serment de l'Empereur. Le nom de son illustre propriétaire, notamment : Sebastian Winterscale, un jeune libre-marchand particulièrement prometteur. On ignore comment il se l'est procuré, mais c'est à son bord que le seigneur-capitaine Winterscale a traversé la Gueule et trouvé un nouveau foyer dans les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族的资料库也有源于帝皇誓约号的记录。它最知名的主人，也就是塞巴斯蒂安·温特斯凯尔，当时是一位前途无量的新晋行商浪人。没人知道塞巴斯蒂安如何得到了这艘船，但温特斯凯尔舰长驾驶它穿越了巨口，在科罗努斯扩区找到了新家。”
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “奥赛罗家族的资料库也有源于帝皇誓约号的记录。它最知名的主人，也就是塞巴斯蒂安·温特斯凯尔，当时是一位前途无量的新晋行商浪人。没人知道塞巴斯蒂安如何得到了这艘船，但温特斯凯尔舰长驾驶它穿越了巨口，在科罗努斯扩区找到了新家。”

languages.text: "Das Librarium des Hauses Orsellio enthielt auch Unterlagen zur Eid des Imperators. Oder besser gesagt zu ihrem berühmtesten Besitzer, Sebastian Winterzunder, einem aufstrebenden und äußerst vielversprechendem Freihändler. Es ist nicht bekannt, wie Sebastian das Schiff in seinen Besitz gebracht hat, doch Lord Captain Winterzunder hat es genutzt, um den Schlund zu durchqueren und in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine neue Heimat zu finden."
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Das Librarium des Hauses Orsellio enthielt auch Unterlagen zur Eid des Imperators. Es ist nicht bekannt, wie Sebastian das Schiff in seinen Besitz gebracht hat, doch Lord Captain Winterzunder hat es genutzt, um den Schlund zu durchqueren und in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine neue Heimat zu finden."

"Das Librarium des Hauses Orsellio enthielt auch Unterlagen zur Eid des Imperators. Oder besser gesagt zu ihrem berühmtesten Besitzer, Sebastian Winterzunder, einem aufstrebenden und äußerst vielversprechendem Freihändler. Es ist nicht bekannt, wie Sebastian das Schiff in seinen Besitz gebracht hat, doch Lord Captain Winterzunder hat es genutzt, um den Schlund zu durchqueren und in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine neue Heimat zu finden."

languages.text: «En el bibliotecarium de la casa Orsellio también hay registros sobre el Voto del Emperador. Su propietario más famoso fue Sebastian Winterscale, un prometedor Comerciante Independiente. No se sabe cómo consiguió esta nave, pero el Lord Capitán Winterscale lo usó para atravesar las Fauces y encontrar un nuevo hogar en la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «En el librarium de la casa Orsellio también hay registros sobre el Voto del Emperador. Su propietario más famoso fue Sebastian Winterscale, un prometedor Comerciante Independiente. No se sabe cómo consiguió esta nave, pero el Lord Capitán Winterscale lo usó para atravesar las Fauces y encontrar un nuevo hogar en la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家の書庫にも『皇帝の誓い』号に関する記録がありました。具体的には、その最も有名な所有者はセバスチャン・ウィンタースケールで、約束された偉大な自由開拓者でした。セバスチャンがこの宇宙船をどのように入手したのかは分かりませんが、ウィンタースケールのロード・キャプテンは、これでマウを横断し、コロヌス・エクスパンスに新しい故郷を見つけたのです」
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家の書庫にも『皇帝の誓い』号に関する記録がありました。具体的には、その最も有名な所有者はセバスチャン・ウィンタースケールで、約束された偉大な自由開拓者でした。セバスチャンがこの宇宙船をどのように入手したのかは分かりませんが、ウィンタースケールのロード・キャプテンは、これでマウを横断し、コロヌス・エクスパンスに新しい故郷を見つけたのです」

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin libraryumunda da İmparator'un Andı'yla ilgili kayıtlar mevcut. En meşhur sahibi, harikulade Hür Tacir Sebastian Winterscale imiş. Sebastian'ın bu gemiyi nasıl edindiği bilinmese de Koronus Enginliği'nde yeni bir yuva bulmak için onunla Ağız'ı geçtiği kayıtlarda yazıyor."
languages.original_text: "The librarium of House Orsellio also held records on the Emperor's Vow. Its most famous owner, to be precise — Sebastian Winterscale, a fledging Rogue Trader of great promise. It is not known how Sebastian acquired this ship, but Lord Captain Winterscale used it to traverse the Maw and find a new home in the Koronus Expanse."
